instructions: It's Hero Kids! Online! Just select your number of dice and hit the button. Keeps track of items and skills too, and it has a Monster Sheet so you can set up bad guys for your players to beat. Comes with a Pet section too, for those cute furry or winged friends who help your heros! All item chekcboxes have a value of 1d6 for roll customization, and items or descriptions/names have the title for macros. If in need of assistance or to report a bug, please send a message to https://app.roll20.net/users/877778/SFX and I will be happy to assist you.
